data.text:
Title: Madame Sarah

Author/s: Cornelia Otis Skinner

Publisher: Cedric Chivers 1973

ISBN-13: 855948639

Condition: Very good, with DJ. Illustrated. Some slight shelf wear. The corners are bumped and covers are rubbed. Slight spinal lean. The DJ is worn to the edges, with chips and creases. Damage to the head and foot of the spine. A well bound copy with clean text.

Binding: Hardcover with DJ

Pages: 313

Dimensions: 22 x 14.5 x 2.5cm.

SKU: AK1223

Price: R90.00

Weight: 0.65 kg

We currently have 1 in stock.

Please see photos for synopsis and more details of the book
